The claim originated from the website Un: which reported that the suspect in a double murder was a "Dreamer" or an undocumented immigrant participating in the DACA program.
The Bexar County Sheriff: s Office, which was leading the murder investigation, stated that they had no indication that the suspect, Jorge Carmond, was an undocumented immigrant.
The DACA program has specific requiremen: including that participants cannot have been convicted of certain crimes and should not pose a threat to national security or public safety.
